recommend_comment.positive_male_young: 활기찬 에너지를 느낄 수 있는 신나는 메뉴를 즐겨보세요!
recommend_comment.negative_male_young: 기분을 전환할 수 있는 특별한 메뉴를 만나보세요.
recommend_comment.positive_male_adult: 성공적인 하루를 축하하며 프리미엄 메뉴를 즐겨보세요!
recommend_comment.neutral_male_adult: 바쁜 일상 속에서 균형 잡힌 선택을 즐겨보세요.
recommend_comment.positive_male_senior: 삶의 여유를 만끽할 수 있는 추천 메뉴를 즐겨보세요.
recommend_comment.neutral_male_senior: 시간이 지나도 변하지 않는 클래식 메뉴를 추천합니다.
recommend_comment.positive_female_young: 즐거운 하루를 위한 재미있고 매력적인 메뉴를 만나보세요!
recommend_comment.negative_female_young: 달콤하고 위로가 되는 특별한 메뉴를 만나보세요.
recommend_comment.positive_female_adult: 매 순간을 축하하며 프리미엄 메뉴를 즐겨보세요!
recommend_comment.negative_female_adult: 편안함을 느낄 수 있는 따뜻한 메뉴를 추천합니다.
recommend_comment.neutral_female_adult: 편리함과 맛을 함께 즐길 수 있는 균형 잡힌 메뉴를 추천합니다.
recommend_comment.negative_female_senior: 마음을 진정시킬 수 있는 따뜻하고 포근한 메뉴를 즐겨보세요.
recommend_comment.neutral_female_senior: 시간이 지나도 변함없는 클래식 메뉴를 추천합니다.
recommend_comment.no_custom: 지금은 맞춤 추천을 제공할 수 없습니다.

en.guide_message: Select items from the menu to add them to your cart

recommend_comment.positive_male_young: Enjoy an exciting menu that will leave you feeling energetic!
recommend_comment.negative_male_young: Experience a special menu that will change your mood.
recommend_comment.neutral_male_young: We recommend the simple yet satisfying classic menu.
recommend_comment.positive_male_adult: Celebrate a successful day and enjoy our premium menu!
recommend_comment.negative_male_adult: Brighten your heart with our warm menu.
recommend_comment.neutral_male_adult: Enjoy balanced choices in your busy daily life.
recommend_comment.positive_male_senior: Enjoy our recommended menus that will help you enjoy leisurely life.
recommend_comment.negative_male_senior: Enjoy our warm menu that will soothe your mind.
recommend_comment.neutral_male_senior: We recommend classic menus that do not change over time.
recommend_comment.positive_female_young: Experience a fun and attractive menu for a fun day!
recommend_comment.negative_female_young: Experience a special menu that is sweet and comforting.
recommend_comment.neutral_female_young: Complete your day with balanced choices.
recommend_comment.positive_female_adult: Celebrate every moment and enjoy our premium menu!
recommend_comment.negative_female_adult: We recommend a warm menu that will make you feel comfortable.
recommend_comment.neutral_female_adult: We recommend a balanced menu that allows you to enjoy both convenience and taste.
recommend_comment.negative_female_senior: Enjoy our warm and cozy menu that will soothe your mind.
recommend_comment.neutral_female_senior: We recommend classic menus that will stand the test of time.
recommend_comment.no_custom: We are unable to provide personalized recommendations at this time.
